title: Lux the Trinity (Blazblue reference)
body:
Found this, and thought "Hey, maybe we could get Magical Girl Lux out of this!"

http://danbooru.donmai.us/data/23bd6a8168f7a2526568524476d801f5.jpg  
http://danbooru.donmai.us/posts/1262101

**Obviously some parts would be changed.** For one, Lux would not have the leg-length pigtails.

But considering both have a big magical laser as their ultimate moves, I think it'd be an appropriate fit.

replies.body: But would she have three different voices swap out at random?
One has to be male though.
Not necessarily. If they're all female voices, Arc System Works would have a harder time suing Riot (if they wanted to) because it wouldn't be a complete copy of Platinum the Trinity.
Totally need 2 male voices then. That's part of what makes platinum, and what would make this skin, funny to me.
Let one of them be Phreak.
Okay, MAYBE have Phreak replace Trinity Glassfille, and that could be hilarious.
If you guys can manage it, that'd be awesome!
Oh, pls, this would be GREAT.
Riot pls. I would buy it the instant it became available.
Only if we can get a Noel Lucian skin.
It'd be better for MF, if for the irony.
